capabilityGroups.description: This agent is responsible for billing and invoicing

capabilities.name: View Bills
capabilities.description: Allows a customer to retrieve and view their latest invoices and billing information.
examples: how much was my last bill?
where can I see my payment history?

capabilities.name: Change Address
capabilities.description: Allows a customer to change their billing address.
examples: change where my bills are sent
I want to change my address for invoices

capabilityGroups.description: This agent assists customers with purchasing products and services

capabilities.name: View Offers
capabilities.description: Allows a customer to browse and view current promotions, discounts, and available offers.
examples: what are the best deals today?
do you offer any student discounts?
let me see your top promotions

capabilities.name: Upgrade Plan
capabilities.description: Helps a customer upgrade their existing service plan.
examples: I want to upgrade my plan
can I switch to a premium package?
add more data to my plan
get more features in my plan

capabilityGroups.description: This agent helps customers place and track their orders

capabilities.name: Place Order
capabilities.description: Allows a customer to place a new order for products or services.
examples: I want to order a new phone
I'd like to subscribe to your service
how can I place an order?
sign me up for your internet plan
I'd like to start a new subscription
can I get a new modem?

capabilities.name: Track Order
capabilities.description: Provides tracking information for an ongoing order.

capabilityGroups.description: This agent provides answers to frequently asked questions about products, services, and policies

capabilities.name: General Inquiry
capabilities.description: Answers common questions regarding the company's services and policies.
examples: what are your customer service hours?
how do I reset my password?
what payment methods do you accept?
how do I update my account info?
do you have a mobile app?
how long is the trial period?

capabilities.name: Troubleshooting Help
capabilities.description: Provides troubleshooting assistance for common technical issues.
examples: why is my internet so slow?
my phone isn’t connecting to the network
